name: semprepzie-v2
description: Modern full-stack Firebase + Node.js project with clean architecture

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:shared
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run copy:frontend && cd backend && npm start
scripts.start:render: bash render-build.sh && cd backend && npm start
scripts.copy:frontend: cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/ || xcopy frontend\dist\* backend\public\ /E /Y
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:shared
